item.title: Place Order
item.description: Command that will place an order
item.author: Postgardner

item.title: Add inventory
item.description: Command that will add item to a given inventory id
item.author: Postgardner

item.title: Update inventory
item.description: Command that will update a given inventory item
item.author: Postgardner

item.title: Cancel shipment
item.description: POST request that will cancel a shipment, identified by its shipmentId.
item.author: Postgardner

item.title: Update shipment status
item.description: POST request that will update the status of a shipment, identified by its shipmentId.
item.author: Postgardner

item.title: Cancel subscription
item.description: Command that will try and cancel a users subscription
item.author: Postgardner

item.title: Subscribe user
item.description: Command that will try and subscribe a given user
item.author: Postgardner

item.title: Create shipment
item.description: POST request that will create a shipment for a specific order, identified by its orderId.
item.author: Postgardner

item.title: Create return label
item.description: POST request that will create a return label for a specific shipment, identified by its shipmentId.
item.author: Postgardner
